long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A suite of modules that enhance your DarkGalaxy browsing experience. 

DarkGalaxy Plus is a community-driven unofficial browser extension for DarkGalaxy. 

NOTE: DarkGalaxy Plus is developed independently, and is not officially endorsed by or affiliated with DarkGalaxy.

DarkGalaxy plus includes various fixes for DarkGalaxy beta released in May 2020. It fixes/augments the interface by achieving the following modifications:
* Colorizes friendly alliances player names and alliance tags (NAP, CAP and WAR coloring)
* Player name tags are now having onclick event which will open the /mail/ system with predefined recipient
* Ingame mail system now supports TO variable which if set would set the recipient
* Cancelling the top building/ship/soldier which is being built at the moment now requires confirmation
* Implements planet, fleet and system navigation with ARROW KEYS (left and right) in building overview
* Capability to send a screenshot to a Discord channel via user defined webhook (or copies it in the clipboard if such is not configured)
* Sorting of planets by name or by population (both planet listing and fleet navigation drop down)
* Sorting of fleets by name in fleet listing
* Sorting comms in the radar section based on turns
* Smart inputs on coordinates in fleet orders and scanning (using dot and backspace now navigates between the coordinates)
* Added confirmation on kicking members
* Added confirmation on invasion planets
* Selecting scan type in comms can be done by clicking anywhere on the row
* Minor bug fixes in DarkGalaxy front-end
* Labels for Repeat and All resources are now activating the checkbox
* Capability to select planet for fleet queuing from the Navigation
* General planet income statistics
* Logistics calculator per planet
* Improved resources transfer with fleet orders
* Capability to select planet for scanning from the Navigation
* Indication of speed modifiers on planet list (ST/HB/JG)
* Indication for currently landed ships
* Ease of transfer resources and ships by clicking the specific resource/ship
* Capability to export the planet list with various details to a CSV file for download
